Author: abgarat
Text: omg same. I was on my way to recovery, I had gained 3 kg up to a \~normal\~ weight (I was weighing 51 kg and now I'm at 54 kg), but the week before my birthday I full-on relapsed. I only allowed myself to enjoy my birthday, and now I'm back to restricting like f\*\*king hell.  the worst part is, I have no idea why.
